titleInfo.title: Conceptualising Pre-Modern and Modern Individuality: Some Theoretical Considerations
Forms of Individuality and Literacy in the Medieval and Early Modern Periods

bibliographicCitation.chicago: Arlinghaus, Franz-Josef. 2015. “Conceptualising Pre-Modern and Modern Individuality: Some Theoretical Considerations”.
